page.title: 16Everyday life in Knypersley.
page.content: On a typical school day I usually rise at 7.30 a.m.After dressing, washing ,breakfasting and feeding the cat I leave home at 8.20 a.m to go to school. My younger sister also accompanies me, as her school is en route to the High School.My journey on foot normally takes twenty minutes,but this can vary depending upon the punctuality of my friends. School hours are from 8.55a.m.to 3.35p.m.with a mid-morning break of 15 minutes and a lunch break of 1 hour. Evenings are occupied with homework and reading,followed by television.The fmily evening meal is usually at 7p.m., typically salad and pizza,with a yoghurtfor a sweet.This is followed by whashing the dishes. I usually retire at about 11-30p.m. after reading or listening to music. A day in the life of Helen Berrigan.
